content: it doesn t get much easier than this pattern for creating a cozy crochet cardigan start with bernat forever fleece tweeds and make 5 simple blocks in a reversible textured fabric including collar detail built right into the pieces no shaping is required simply practice single_crochet chain 1 texture pattern stitch and more you ll love the tweedy effect of the yarn that elevates the look of this garment bernat® forever fleece tweeds™ 8 8 oz/250 g 158 yds/145 m model is wearing size xs/s model has 34 86 5 cm chest and is 5 9 tall
